## Libraries and data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
load("county.rda")
```

## Data

```{r}
county %>% 
  as_tibble()

county_df <- 
  county %>% 
  as_tibble()
```

## Simple Random Sampling

```{r}
# repeat many times
county %>% 
  slice_sample(n = 10)
```

## Group by

```{r}
county %>%
  group_by(metro) 
```

```{r}
county %>%
  group_by(metro) %>% 
  count()
```

```{r}
county %>%
  group_by(metro) %>% 
  summarise(my_ave_home = mean(homeownership), my_median_home = median(homeownership))
```

## Stratified Sampling

```{r}
county %>%
  drop_na() %>% 
  group_by(metro) %>%
  slice_sample(n = 5)
```

## Nesting

```{r}
county %>%
  group_by(state) %>%
  nest() %>% 
  print(n=51)
```

## Cluster Sampling

```{r}
county %>%
  group_by(state) %>%
  nest() %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  slice_sample(n = 5)
```
